title: Neverland Map necklace - Peter Pan

description: Glass cabochon domed pendant with chain. Alloy metal. 24 inch matching rolo link chain with lobster clasp. Small organza bag included. 25/30mm bezel. Not waterproof. Colors may vary depending on viewing device. The glass dome cabochon does magnify the image slightly. Each item is handmade, so some minor differences in images/pendants may be possible. Message me with metal color if you'd like shiny silver, antique silver, copper, or black. If no message is recieved, it will be the antique brass one as depicted. Thank you! K Blue Art Designs
